item.title: Percona Community MeetUp - Installation and Configuration of PostgreSQL Operator - March, 2nd
item.description: Learn more about Installation and Configuration of PostgreSQL Operator in this video from our meetup of Wednesday, March, 2nd at 11 am EST. Nickolay Ihalainen show us how to work with PG replication cluster and internal components, access to your database, put data in it and use in your application, dealing with failover, backup, restore. This event is a part of our regular meetup series hosted by the Head of Open Source Strategy at Percona, Matt Yonkovit.
